name: Draw Your Alien!
description:
Draw Your Alien!

Draw Your Alien Is A Cool Game Made With Scratch!

Note
  • This Game Is Still In Development
  • Bugs Are Still Being Fixed
How To Play
  • Reset - Resets Everything
  • Talk With Your Alien - Allows You To Talk With Your Alien
  • Stroke - Sets Line Width For Drawing
